title: nikiton1994
author: nikiton1994
created_time: December 21, 2022, 05:39:16 PMLast edit: December 22, 2022, 10:42:59 AM by nikiton1994
content: What happened:: The #1 crypto casino in the world blocked access to my account with a balance of approximately $750Scammers Profile Link: https://trustdice.win/Reference Link: my login sitnikov-nikita@mail.ru, nickname nikiton1994Amount Scammed: 750$Payment Method: USDTProof of Payment: https://tronscan.org/#/transaction/46a817b21c8ac737595e501c7dec5c7f2a8b98bda3b0703561de80e977a384b2https://tronscan.org/#/transaction/634be294583d4de7acb8dec45bde589b5b1dd2a13ff7eca056e0cb002e708f57https://tronscan.org/#/transaction/a82568af7c69e4c3ad39e02ddcaa63625dd7628fd7641de2fb58aaa2bf1bd3f2https://tronscan.org/#/transaction/7f4a4f91b2bed91ca1f055a296cf83256d98221488b8a629cb0d159c76fe0ef6https://tronscan.org/#/transaction/9a365146d5595ad714d58e4da39d6085c4943becbaed34ab4711a410f568a260https://tronscan.org/#/transaction/84e39132222a5aec9f19baf12ea2ab82153b405006ca1db3f395abc1ac68348fPM/Chat Logs: https://imgur.com/a/zwzRyhsAdditional Notes: Good evening. About a month ago on the forums I heard about the #1 CryptoCasino in the world - trustdice.win. High rating, good reviews, online chat with live players on the site. Great, signed up, started playing. He made sports bets on football, basketball, hockey. Most of them are top championships, NBA, NHL. Payments came in 15 minutes, in rare cases there were delays from 4 to 12 hours. 2 weeks after the next NBA matches, I put part of the balance on the withdrawal. After 6 hours, I received a win. Then I decided to put another part. A few hours later I couldn't log into my account. "Your account has been blocked." On the account of about $ 750. I received a message in the mail with a link to the paragraph of the rules, which I allegedly violated. For all the time, if you compare how much money I lost and how much I won, I managed to win about $1000. After that CryptoCasino No. 1 in the World decided that these were irreparable losses and silently blocked my account and stole my money. Please help me solve this problem, because the support of this site is ignoring me. Attached all kinds of screenshots and links to transactions. I don't have anything else because I can't log into my account. I don’t know English well enough, so I typed all the text using Google translator. I apologize in advance if there are any mistakes.

comments.author: Laki21000
comments.body: And hello again @coinbox1, OP was blocked for me for the same reason exactly the same as yours, check it out.   https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5425888.0I'm not surprised at all that you haven't changed your attitude. However, we are waiting for a response from the casino representative, perhaps there will be evidence of blocking.

comments.author: Poika5
comments.body: December 6th? All 3 of us were banned on the same day. Laki21000, is OP your friend? TRC20 USDT, from the same country, banned on the same day.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: This is going to start looking fishy if we start seeing a bunch of newbies pop up with accusations. It's fine if legitimate claims but I'm also noticing the same people coming to defend the new accusation. Let's make sure it's an accurate claim before jumping on trustdice. @Coinbox1 you might look at how many players were banned for the same thing these guys are claiming and look for connections to each account. I'm not saying I don't believe you OP but I think it's best for a site to be safe rather than sorry later.

comments.body: Quote from: Poika5 on December 21, 2022, 10:32:55 PMDecember 6th? All 3 of us were banned on the same day. Laki21000, is OP your friend? TRC20 USDT, from the same country, banned on the same day.You're laughing? I don't know who it is at all. But it looks suspicious.Apparently, he was blocked recently, in any case, I would not advise trustdice to any of my friends, then I will definitely be left without friends QuoteLet's make sure it's an accurate claim before jumping on trustdice. @Coinbox1 you might look at how many players were banned for the same thing these guys are claiming and look for connections to each account.I'm not defending anyone, by any means.

Poika5 seems trying to find connection between Laki21000 and OP so clearly he is standing on the other side than them.It will be nice to hear from the Trustdice team. Would be even better if they show some evidences rather than just words when they explain.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Laki21000 is a different person, he just have a similar complaint in his thread Trustdice.win , UPD: TRUSTDICE SCAM, 2138$ USDT confiscated. (SOLVED) but already resolved.However they don't give a good explanation about the accusation, but since they're care with their reputation they're made full payment to Laki21000.So I don't really expect about the clear explanation of the reason why your account got blocked, maybe you will get the payment.Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on December 22, 2022, 12:31:51 AMQuote from: yahoo62278 on December 21, 2022, 11:09:37 PM @Coinbox1 you might look at how many players were banned for the same thing these guys are claiming and look for connections to each account. Who is @coinbox1 and what is his relation to the accusation?Coinbox1 is a Trustdice's representative in this forum.

comments.author: nikiton1994
comments.body: Hello everyone. I want to say "Thank you to all". The TrustDice team contacted me and asked for a wallet address for a refund. I hope these are isolated cases of their mistakes. My account has not been unblocked, so I would be grateful if someone could recommend a really reliable bookmaker!

Maybe stake or you can try to play on Winz.io for other games as well, since we are legit.Its glad you have your funds back, now never return to trustdice and you can lock this thread
